titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that determinations regarding whether an individual who is a contractor providing services to an educational organization is a full time employee for purposes of requirements relating to an employer's responsibility to provide health coverage are subject to rules that apply to employees of educational organizations.

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify that determinations regarding whether an individual who is a contractor providing services to an educational organization is a full time employee for purposes of requirements relating to an employer's responsibility to provide health coverage are subject to rules that apply to employees of educational organizations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
